Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 12 Vacchagottasaṃyutta » 12.1 Vacchagottavagga
12.1.21--25 Rūpaappaṭivedhādisuttapañcaka
Vacchagottasaṃyutta
Vacchagottavagga
Rūpaappaṭivedhādisuttapañcaka
627--631.
1259Sāvatthinidānaṃ. Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo…pe… . “Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaṭivedhā…pe…  viññāṇe kho, vaccha, appaṭivedhā…pe… .
1260Pañcavīsatimaṃ.
